mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hypodermic syringe
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Becton-Dickinson [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white box is labeled: "B-D Yale Syringe, No. 20Y 20CC. Becton, Dickinson ' CO. Rutherford, N.J. MADE IN U.S.A." Inside the box are two slips of paper, one advertises new products, the other is a Certificate of Examination dated Mar 31, 1941. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Hypodermic syringes
